protect-links:
Edit summary when the bot protects all pages linked from a page. Parameters:
* $(page)s - page title
See also:
* {{msg-pywikibot|Delete-linked-pages}}
protect-simple: Edit summary when the bot protects a list of files.
protect-category:
Edit summary when the bot protects all pages from a category. Parameters:
* %(cat)s - category name
See also:
* {{msg-pywikibot|Delete-from-category}}
protect-ref:
Edit summary when the bot protects all pages that link to/transclude a page (Special:WhatLinksHere). Parameters:
* %(page)s - page title
See also:
* {{msg-pywikibot|Delete-referring-pages}}
protect-images:
Edit summary when the bot protects all images on a page. Parameters:
* %(page)s - page title
See also:
* {{msg-pywikibot|Delete-images}}
